EmailTemplate.subject: Welcome to DealChicken
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!echosign_dev1__SIGN_Agreement__c.echosign_dev1__Account__c},
Dear [name of merchant] ,
Thank you so much for becoming a part of the DealChicken team. We are looking forward to selling your merchandise on the DealChicken site in the near future. A few things to think about as we begin our partnership:
1. Merchandise Needs - We are looking for all sorts of products including jewelry, electronics, spa and kitchen supplies and more. • If you have any items that you are interested in us putting on DealChicken, send sample products with your merchant name inside the box to: Adam Bender, DealChicken, Gannett Corporation, 7950 Jones Branch Dr, McLean, VA 22107. • Let your main point of contact know what products are being sent and the price points for each.
2. Sample Process - At DealChicken, we want to feature the best daily deals and provide a channel for our merchants to move a large volume of merchandise. In order to accomplish this, we have a sample review process. • DealChicken must receive samples for all merchandise promotions a minimum of 10 days before the promotion run date. • A few things to think about before sending samples: • Merchandise must be sent as it would be received by our users. • Merchandise should be clearly labeled with the name of the product and your company name. • Instructions and documentation written in English without grammatical or spelling errors should be included for each product. • Please note, we do not return samples.
3. Refund policy – At DealChicken our refund policy for merchandise is that the “Merchant’s refund policy applies” • Your order form includes the expected response time for consumer questions or correspondence. • Please do not refer customers back to DealChicken for product issues such as faulty merchandise, returns, etc. • It is our hope that we do not receive calls coming in from consumers who were directed back to DealChicken, as that would require DealChicken to halt all future promotions.
{!DealChicken_Project__c.Handler__c} {!echosign_dev1__SIGN_Agreement__c.DC_Area_Manager_NameF__c}, {!echosign_dev1__SIGN_Agreement__c.DC_Area_Manager_Location__c} {!echosign_dev1__SIGN_Agreement__c.DC_Area_Manager_EmailF__c} {!echosign_dev1__SIGN_Agreement__c.DC_Area_Manager_Phone__c}
How will I know who purchases my deal? After your deal starts, you'll receive a full report with the number of deals sold, a checklist of buyers and total revenue.
When will I receive payment? Expect your first payment 70% of your share of the deal's revenue five business days after the deal ends if you've chosen direct-deposit. If you've chosen to receive a check, this process can take up to three weeks. The balance payment (excluding refunds, if any) will be processed 25 business days after your deal closes.
